H0.text: In the Bible who was the mother of King Solomon. Bathshua

H1.text: In the Bible who was the mother of King Solomon. Abihail

H2.text: In the Bible who was the mother of King Solomon. Maacah

H3.text: In the Bible who was the mother of King Solomon. Basheva

A4.text: By Bathsheba, his sons were Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon.
